Name: ReTox
About the game: Have a chance to experience the wildest ride imaginable... Unless you can't read, then it's your loss. A satire on bitter reality. Feel bad for your decisions. Try almost every drug and possibility. Harm or even kill yourself with your choices. Lots of text and different routes. Hub containing various locations.
